item.title: Telefónica confirms internal ticketing system breach after data leak
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: Spanish telecommunications company Telefónica confirms its internal ticketing system was breached after stolen data was leaked on a hacking forum. [...]

item.title: New Web3 attack exploits transaction simulations to steal crypto
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Threat actors are employing a new tactic called "transaction simulation spoofing" to steal crypto, with one attack successfully stealing 143.45 Ethereum, worth approximately $460,000. [...]

item.title: US charges operators of cryptomixers linked to ransomware gangs
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: The U.S. Department of Justice indicted three operators of sanctioned Blender.io and Sinbad.io crypto mixer services used by ransomware gangs and North Korean hackers to launder ransoms and stolen cryptocurrency. [...]

item.title: Treasury hackers also breached US foreign investments review office
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Chinese hackers, part of the state-backed Silk Typhoon threat group, have reportedly breached the Committee on Foreign Investment in the United States (CFIUS), which reviews foreign investments to determine national security risks. [...]

item.title: Docker Desktop blocked on Macs due to false malware alert
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: Docker is warning that Docker Desktop is not starting on macOS due to malware warnings after some files were signed with an incorrect code-signing certificate. [...]

item.title: Proton worldwide outage caused by Kubernetes migration, software change
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Swiss tech company Proton, which provides privacy-focused online services, says that a Thursday worldwide outage was caused by an ongoing infrastructure migration to Kubernetes and a software change that triggered an initial load spike. [...]

item.title: STIIIZY data breach exposes cannabis buyers’ IDs and purchases
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: Popular cannabis brand STIIIZY disclosed a data breach this week after hackers breached its point-of-sale (POS) vendor to steal customer information, including government IDs and purchase information. [...]

item.title: Microsoft to force install new Outlook on Windows 10 PCs in February
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: Microsoft will force install the new Outlook email client on Windows 10 systems starting with next month's security update. [...]

item.title: Fake CrowdStrike job offer emails target devs with crypto miners
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: CrowdStrike is warning that a phishing campaign is impersonating the cybersecurity company in fake job offer emails to trick targets into infecting themselves with a Monero cryptocurrency miner (XMRig). [...]

item.title: Largest US addiction treatment provider notifies patients of data breach
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​BayMark Health Services, North America's largest provider of substance use disorder (SUD) treatment and recovery services, is notifying an undisclosed number of patients that attackers stole their personal and health information in a September 2024 breach. [...]

item.title: Banshee stealer evades detection using Apple XProtect encryption algo
item.dc:creator: Bill Toulas
item.description: A new version of the Banshee info-stealing malware for macOS has been evading detection over the past two months by adopting string encryption from Apple's XProtect. [...]

item.title: Microsoft fixes OneDrive bug causing macOS app freezes
item.dc:creator: Sergiu Gatlan
item.description: ​Microsoft has fixed a known issue causing macOS applications to freeze when opening or saving files in OneDrive. [...]

item.title: Proton Mail still down as Proton recovers from worldwide outage
item.dc:creator: Lawrence Abrams
item.description: Privacy firm Proton suffered a massive worldwide outage today, taking down most services, with Proton Mail and Calendar users still unable to connect to their accounts. [...]
